text: Can you help me add a new schedule to my agenda?
Sure, I'd be happy to help. What should be the content of this schedule?
Great. When should this meeting take place?
The meeting should be on the 21th of September at 3 pm.
And where would you like the meeting to take place?
The meeting will take place in the cafeteria.
Alright. Let me add this schedule to your agenda. Please wait a moment while I authenticate your account.
Okay, I have retrieved your token.
Done. The schedule "Meeting with John" on the 21th of September at 3 pm in the cafeteria has been added to your agenda.
